settings.weekStart_description: Choose which day starts the week in the calendar.
settings.timeFormat_description: Display time in 12-hour format (AM/PM) instead of 24-hour format.
settings.gridColor_description: Choose the color used for calendar grid lines.
settings.hourLineOpacity_description: Adjust the opacity of hour lines.
settings.dayLineOpacity_description: Adjust the opacity of day separator lines.
